description.value:
At 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.UEGGABQ79I8A8CG5]{Twister} spell adjacent to you once per long rest. When cast this way, you automatically succeed the twister Strength (Save) check unless you choose to fail it. 
You can use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence as your spellcasting attribute when casting spells this way.
If you are a spellcaster, you can also add these spells to your spell list. They are always prepared and do not count against the spells you can prepare each day.
